content.raw: The only thing that concerns me is the use of the `Toggle` function for enabling and disabling things. Coupled with the external `toggle` topic, I could imagine scenarios where things get out of sync. There may be some cases in which `Toggle` is indeed the desired action, but there are also cases where `Toggle` is used to disable and the state is assumed to be on. I would prefer that there were explicit functions for Enable and Disable, and that `Toggle` would call these functions if necessary. Then the logic would feel a little safer.
